name: HexSpace
description:
You are a hotshot spaceship fighter.

Explore the system.

Shoot ships.

Get shot at.

Have fun.

Controls:

  • w/s to increase/decrease speed
  • a/d to strafe left/right
  • e/q to strafe up/down
  • space to fire
  • esc to pause
  • aim with mouse
Controls can be modified under the settings page.

Made for #LOWREZJAM2016.
